fertilizer-prediction.title: Fertilizer Prediction
fertilizer-prediction.soil-type-placeholder: Select soil type (Sandy, Clay, Silt, Peat, Loam, Chalk)

text-section.heading: Access MSP Information with Ease
text-section.paragraph: Our platform empowers users to effortlessly find the Minimum Support Price (MSP) of various agricultural products within their locality.

nitrogen.label: Nitrogen
nitrogen.content: Nitrogen is essential for plant growth as it is a major component of chlorophyll and amino acids.

rainfall.label: Rainfall
rainfall.content: Rainfall provides the water necessary for plant growth, affecting soil moisture and nutrient availability.

phosphorous.label: Phosphorous
phosphorous.content: Phosphorous supports the development of roots, flowers, seeds, and fruits in plants.

pottasium.label: Pottasium
pottasium.content: Pottasium helps with the overall health of plants, improving disease resistance and water efficiency.

phLevel.label: pH Level
phLevel.content: pH measures the acidity or alkalinity of soil, which is important for nutrient availability and plant growth.

dialogBody.title: Yield Prediction Data
dialogBody.successMessage: Dear Farmer, your hard work has paid off! You've achieved a total production of {{totalProduction}} tons this season. These results are a testament to your dedication and expertise. Keep up the great work, and let's aim even higher next season!
